GSD.product_version: versions from v5.1 to before v5.19.4
GSD.description:
devlink: Fix use-after-free after a failed reload

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.4 by commit 26bef5616255066268c0e40e1da10cc9b78b82e9, it was introduced in version v5.1 by commit 98bbf70c1c41fb9547c3a18c0f1b96f6ebb8eb1d. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: devlink: Fix use-after-free after a failed reload
